Updated: 24 March 2023
m SINGAPORE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY SITLEARN PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT
0: How do I obtain the in-principal approval letter?
A: For AHPC registration, please contact AHPC at AHPC@spb.gov.sg .
0: I submitted my registration but did not receive any follow up email for payment.
A: All registrations for each examination run will be reviewed after the application deadline.
SIT LEARN will follow-up with applicants if we have any queries. After the review, applicants will
then receive an automated email on the payment details
0: Is there a preparatory course before the examination?
A: There is currently no preparatory course before the examination.
0: Do I need to be in Singapore to attend the examination?
A: Candidat es need to be physically  present in Singapore to take the examination. All
examinations are conducted in-person and at SIT@Dover.
Updated: 24 March 2023 Page 2 of 2
